body.name: BristleComb Outdoor Broom and Dustpan Set Upright – 49" Long Adjustable Broom and Dust Pan with Long Handle, Self-Cleaning Comb & 2 Interchangeable Heads of Different Stiffness - Medium and Coarse
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 37 mins
features: ✔ 2 INTERCHANGEABLE BROOM HEADS: BristleComb Outdoor Broom and Dustpan Set comes with 2 interchangeable heads of different stiffness – with Medium (light grey) and Coarse (dark grey) bristles. Twist locking mechanism makes changing heads quick and easy.

✔ HEAVY-DUTY: The Broom and Dustpan set interface is made of heavy-duty plastic and the handle is made of stainless steel, durable enough to use in outdoor conditions. Shorter and stiffer broom bristles effectively whisk coarser surfaces and grab debris that is heavier than dust and dirt.

✔ EASY STORAGE: Expandable broom and dust pan lock together for upright, compact storage either folded up for slim areas or flat. It can be stored in the gaps of refrigerators, sinks, washing machines, etc. to save space and keep your home clean and tidy.

✔ UNIQUE DUSTPAN COMB: The BristleComb Outdoor Broom and Dustpan Set features unique self-cleaning comb to remove debris from broom bristles. The unique dustpan comb pulls out hair and debris so that you no longer have to pull it out manually.

✔ EXTENDABLE HANDLE: The BristleComb Outdoor Broom and Dustpan Set with a sturdy, stainless steel, twist-and-lock handle extends from 36" to 49" long simply by adding the extension pole; allowing it to reach objects or adjust to various user heights. Broom and dust pan with long handle allows you to stand upright for comfortable sweeping.
body.description: THE BRISTLECOMB OUTDOOR BROOM AND DUSTPAN SET IS PERFECT FOR ANY OUTDOOR SWEEPING TASKIf you are looking for an outdoor broom and dustpan that handles an easy way to sweep everything from tile floors to garage floors or wood decks, the BristleComb Outdoor Broom and Dust Pan with an extendable handle is a perfect and clever choice.Upgraded expandable handle broom allows you to stand upright for comfortable sweeping, unique dustpan "comb" removes dirt and dust from broom bristles, 2 interchangeable heads of different stiffness help to sweep coarser surfaces and grab debris that is heavier than dust and dirt.KEY FEATURES:The built-in front-facing "comb" to clean broom into a dustpan with one easy move. No need to bend over and get back pain or to get your hands dirty! Easy to remove pet or human hair and dustA flexible lip that conforms to surfaces so dust is not swept underneath it, for maximum pickupLight and ergonomic, the BristleComb Broom and Dustpan Set is designed to ensure comfort with its non-slip grip handleClip and snap steel pole and dustpan together for broom and dustpan set upright or flat extra compact storage.Expandable handled broom extends up to 49" long - perfect for efficient and comfortable sweeping.The broom and dustpan combo is easy to operate that even kids can help to sweep the floors2 interchangeable heads of different stiffness - with Medium (light grey head) and Coarse (dark grey head) bristles for more effective sweeping of different surfaces SET INCLUDES:. One Medium Broom Head (.35mm Bristles). One Coarse Broom Head (.55mm Bristles). Adjustable Stainless Steel Handles (36\" or 49\"). Lay Flat Dustpan with Comb to remove debris

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very durable and take minimal space for storage. Perfect for my daughter’s dorm

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The company responded to my review and sent me a new broom. This one works much better than the first one. I’ve used it all summer with no problems.This item seemed to fit all my needs. I wanted it for my camper. The problem is it won’t stay together. Continually fell apart when I was using it. Unfortunately I couldn’t return it, since I didn’t discover this issue until after the return date ended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was so quick to put together and the brush head is so nice! I used this when I went camping, and it was nice to break it down for travel. It’s lightweight when put together and sturdy enough that I know it’ll last. Great price for the quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact good for small areas
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Great for super small areas. We got it for our rv. Will definitely buy again when needs replaced

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Life and Space Saver While Camping
reviews.reviewText: I bought this broom and dustpan combo to take with us camping. We use a tent and it drives me crazy when the family trecks dirt inside. I was able to pack this in a back with the rest of our equipment. It was easy to put together, and it worked for what I needed it for. My only complaint is that the broom will spin if you don't tighten it enough, and if you tighten it too much, it is hard to break down again. Overall, I recommend and this is now a must-have while camping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great for a camp trailer. The handle does not stay together I keep having to tighten it. But it works, may use plumbers tape to keep it screwed together. Love that it comes with 2 brushes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Exactly what I needed to sweep up the constant berries that fall from our backyard tree.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars CAN BE USED IN OR OUTSIDE
reviews.reviewText: I was able to sweep outside carpet on porch clean (pre owner put carpet on porch) washed it off and swept up kit hen. Sweeps up clesnly
I really like this broom,and dust pan combo.Comes with 2 sizes of broom attachments.Sore back,I'd recommend.

Fácil de usar, funciona perfecto con el pelo y esa fastidiosa basura que se queda pegada en las escobas, y si no te gusta la escoba que te dan, puedes usar otra. En mi caso tengo piso laminado, y usé una escoba especial
Love the fact you get two different brooms and seems to be well made.
